title: Episode 79: Sweaty Atheists and Drew Dyck on Generation Ex:Christian!
description: Does God make atheists sweat?? Plus, guest Drew Dyck talks about his book, Generation Ex-Christian, and the reasons more and more Christian kids are walking away from their faith! Don't miss it! It may or may not have something to do with the end of Western Civilization as we know it!

Don't miss it! It may or may not have something to do with the end of Western Civilization as we know it!
